mdRecord.dcterms:title: First Congregational Church of Western Springs, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Elmslie, George Grant (American architect, 1871-1952) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: G. Grant Elmslie, a Prairie School architect and highly regarded associate of the renowned Louis Sullivan, designed this new building. Today the elegant woodwork patterns, the resplendent stained glass window above the altar, and the detailed stonework on our building's edifice serve as stunning reminders of Elmslie's talents. http://www.wscongo.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=192&Itemid=261 [work]
